title: Dyer's Record Book, 1867
medium: Medium: cardboard, marbled paper and printed textile samples
dimensions: H x W x D (closed): 34 x 21 x 3 cm (13 3/8 x 8 1/4 x 1 3/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles. Contains 214 samples in various designs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1867.
1867. Medium: cardboard, marbled paper and printed textile samples. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-4.
